subject: I WANT TO INVEST IN YOUR COUNTRY
body:
Dear Sir,

I received your mail, you have nothing to worry about as I have mapped
out the necessary plan to conclude this transaction without any
question being asked, this is 100% risk free, the necessary documents
you need for the claim of this fund will be prepared by an attorney
here in Hong Kong and forward to you.

All I want you to please assure me is this, you will not let me down
in this regard once the fund is in your possession as the beneficiary,
and I have also fashioned out a way with which this transaction can be
handled without any problems with your full cooperation and trust. I
have been able to secure a fiduciary that will enable us to transact
this business without many questions being asked. I will prepare the
entire necessary document using an attorney here in Hong Kong, The
attorney is the one that is going to write a letter and give to me and
I will send you the letter you will send to the bank for the transfer
of the said funds that is in Late Mr. Smith A. James account to your
personal bank account in your country without much question being
asked and you have to act very fast and also follow my instruction so
that we can conclude this transaction.

I want you to know that this transaction is 100% risk free, so I would
need you to provide me with the followings:


1, Your Full Names.
2, Your Address.
3, Tel/fax lines.
4, International passport or drivers license.
5, Occupation


With these details required documentation will be prepared in your
name as the Next of kin to Late Mr. Smith A James $18.750 million USD,
I really appreciate your concern.

As soon as I hear from you with the above information, we shall
proceed and utilize this big opportunity God has given us and I want
you to agree with me that after the 9/11 fiasco, one cannot just
transfer huge amounts directly to any country like that without the
due process.

As soon as I hear from you today with your information, I shall
proceed and forward your details to the attorney for the documentation
and also ask him for the letter you are going to send to the bank with
the bank contact details so that we can proceed.

I have add you in my prayer from today and I know that God in his
infinite mercies will help us through with this transaction

Thanks in anticipation.

John Zhu.

subject: Re: I WANT TO INVEST IN YOUR COUNTRY
body:
Hello John Zhu,

Thank you for your detailed email. It's quite an interesting proposition you've laid out here. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with these types of transactions, but I'm eager to learn more.

You mentioned that this is risk-free and that an attorney in Hong Kong will prepare all the necessary documents. That sounds reassuring. Could you tell me more about this attorney? What's their name and how long have they been practicing law?

Also, you mentioned a fiduciary that will help us transact this business without many questions being asked. Could you please explain what a fiduciary is? And how does it work in this context?

I noticed that you're asking for some personal details from me. While I understand the need for such information in certain circumstances, I would like to know more about why these specific details are needed and how they will be used.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Kendra

subject: Re: I WANT TO INVEST IN YOUR COUNTRY
body:
Dear  Kendra  ,

Like i said before now,  you don't have any fear in concluding this
transaction and the percentage is 50/50, all i needed from you is your full
cooperation and follow my instruction to enable me guard you through and
have the funds in your possession because this transaction is 100% risk
free, I am waiting to hear from you with the below details to enable me
proceed with the preparation of the entire documents in your name and
forward along with the bank contact details.

Below is the information needed for the preparation of the documents in
your name as the beneficiary.

Your full name
Address
Telephone number
Occupation
Scan copy of your ID


Once I have the above details, we will proceed and achieve our dreams
together.
Best Regards,

John Zhu

subject: Re: I WANT TO INVEST IN YOUR COUNTRY
body:
Hello John Zhu,

Thank you for your message. It's really exciting to hear about this opportunity! I'm just a bit curious, could you please explain more about the process? How does it work exactly?

Also, I'd love to know more about how we can achieve our dreams together. What kind of dreams are we talking about here?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Kendra

subject: Re: I WANT TO INVEST IN YOUR COUNTRY
body:
Dear  Kendra  ,

Thank you for your response.I must say that I have enormous respect for
you considering the manner in which I have made contact with you. We never
know when life is about to shower us with good fortune,however we spend so
much time wishing that life does.

My late customer happens to be Mr Smith A.James.Let's move forward and see
what we can achieve. You see someone close to me recently became ill and
his medical examinations are about to be initiated. I have hurriedly put
together this message. In everything one does with another, there must be
a meeting of minds. In Latin, it's called consensus ad idem: Without us
both seeing and assessing the situation through the same lenses there
cannot and will never be success or progress. So as we say in Chinese
thoroughness is what is needed here.I am a family man with 3 lovely
children,a boy and two girls.

I need for you to obey my every instruction and do exactly as I say. You
must let me direct this project for us to have success. This is non
non-negotiable. It is when there is no leadership and no meeting of minds
that
there are problems. Everything is going to be done in sequence. I will
imagine that the whole process should take about 2 weeks before the money
will be in your nominated Bank Account. At this stage I have exclusive
access
to the files. I will be instructing a Solicitor/Attorney in Hong Kong,China
to
prepare all the documents in your name.

This will then be put in my file and presented to my bank. It will be
approved and then authorization given to my Bank to make payment to you.
Please this is very important and your total commitment is what is
desired. I will be speaking to you only and when necessary as this is a
precaution. Most communication will be done via this email.

At this stage I am sure you have a lot of questions you want to ask. We
are going to take this matter on a step-by-step basis. However, something
that I must point out to you at this stage is that there is no wrong on
your part.

At the end of the day it is the Wing Hang Bank that will be contacting you
to inform you that money has been left for you. You are not contacting the
bank so you are doing absolutely nothing wrong or taking any risk. The
only person who could have disputed this is long gone.

You must understand why there must be serious confidentiality about this
whole process. Wing Hang Bank is a specialist bank, which deals with high
net worth individuals and giant corporations. As soon as my Bank has gone
through all formalities with you, they will make payments to you. This
will be done through an Attorney as certain verifications required by law
have to be done.

As soon as I have made the necessary amendments you become the legal
beneficiary and my Bank will get in contact with you immediately.
My friend please let us be positive and show discretion as we both make
one of the most fruitful steps of our lives. My spoken English is not too
good,you will understand me more when I call you, please, send your
complete details for the preparation of the required documents.

Full Name
Address
Telephone Number
Occupation
A scan copy of your Identification.

I await your prompt response.
Regards,

John Zhu

subject: Re: I WANT TO INVEST IN YOUR COUNTRY
body:
Hello John Zhu,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's quite an interesting situation you've described, and I must admit, it's not something I encounter every day. 

I'm sorry to hear about the person close to you who has fallen ill. Health issues can be quite challenging, and I hope they recover soon.

You mentioned a process that should take about two weeks before the money will be in my nominated Bank Account. Could you please elaborate more on this process? What are the steps involved?

Also, you mentioned that everything will be done via email. Is there any specific reason for this? Would it not be more secure to handle such matters through official channels or face-to-face meetings?

I understand that Wing Hang Bank is a specialist bank dealing with high net worth individuals and giant corporations. How did Mr Smith come into contact with them? And why was his account left unclaimed?

Lastly, I appreciate your request for my personal details but due to privacy concerns, I am unable to share them over email at this time. However, I am open to discussing further details of this matter.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Kendra

subject: Re: I WANT TO INVEST IN YOUR COUNTRY
Re: I WANT TO INVEST IN YOUR COUNTRY
body:
Hello there! I hope you're having a great day. I'm always eager to learn and share information. What's the topic we're discussing today?

Best wishes,
Kendra

subject: Re: I WANT TO INVEST IN YOUR COUNTRY
body:
Hello John Zhu,

Thank you for your message. It's really exciting to hear about this opportunity! I'm just a simple person, so I hope you can bear with me as I try to understand everything.

You mentioned something about needing my full name, address, telephone number, occupation and a scan copy of my ID. But before we proceed with that, could you please explain more about the process? How does it work exactly? And what are these documents for?

I'm really looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Kendra
